name: Navigate
description:
NAVIGATE is a game created in just shy of 2 days for the VIMJAM (maximum time was 7 days). Control the thrust of a crazy rocket in this INFINITE, RETRO, ARCADE-STYLE game! Using your mouse to navigate the moving labyrinth, COLLECT the coins and AVOID the walls at all costs.

Rest assured there are plenty of POWER-UPS to help you progress and grow your score to the max!

Will you be able to master all of the levels?

You'll have to NAVIGATE to find out

Controlls: Left Click To Move

  • Game Created By: MATHEW JENKINS
  • Music / SFX Used From: https://freesound.org/
  • Song: Retro.m4a By: B_Sean
  • Death Sound Effect: Retro Explosion By: Stumpbutt
  • Collect Sound Effect: Retro Jump By: Stumpbutt
  • IcePixel Font By: Style-7 (1001Fonts.com)

Thanks for playing, make sure to comment your HIGHSCORE!
